snippet: The decision to gag officeholders at the annual Sept. 11 ceremony ensures what Lincoln erroneously predicted at Gettysburg: “The world will little note nor long remember what we say here.”
abstract: The decision to gag officeholders at the annual Sept. 11 ceremony ensures what Lincoln erroneously predicted at Gettysburg: “The world will little note nor long remember what we say here.”

headline.print_headline: Essay: At 9/11 Event, Leadership Isn’t Invited
